item.title: Planning a Wedding Around a Major Holiday
item.description: Holiday-weekend weddings can be magical—built-in themes, festive moods, and extra days off. They can also get expensive and complicated fast.
item.content:encoded:
Holiday-weekend weddings can be magical—built-in themes, festive moods, and extra days off. They can also get expensive and complicated fast.

item.title: Planning a Wedding Around a Major Holiday
item.description: Writing thank-you notes doesn’t have to be a post-wedding slog. With a short formula and a good system, you can knock them out quickly and actually enjoy it.
item.content:encoded:
Writing thank-you notes doesn’t have to be a post-wedding slog. With a short formula and a good system, you can knock them out quickly and actually enjoy it.
